title: Coastal Vacation Retreat
description: A complete redesign of a beachfront vacation home, creating a serene retreat that celebrates coastal views and indoor-outdoor living. The design features a light color palette, weather-resistant materials, and comfortable spaces for gathering and relaxation.

images.alt: Bright living area with ocean views

testimonial.quote: Our vacation home is now truly a place where we can relax and recharge. The design perfectly captures the coastal atmosphere we wanted.
testimonial.author: The Lawson Family
